1.name: Inland transport
1.desc:
Transport by which goods are moved from or to the frontier, or between
                                    inland points.

2.name: At the statistical territory limit
2.desc:
Point by which the means of transport are presumed to have left the
                                    statistical territory of despatch or to have entered the statistical territory of
                                    arrival.

10.name: Pre-carriage transport
10.desc:
Transport by which the goods are moved prior to their main carriage
                                    transport.

11.name: At border
11.desc: Transport by which goods are moved to the Customs frontier.

12.name: At departure
12.desc: Transport by which goods are moved from the place of departure.

13.name: At destination
13.desc: Transport by which goods are moved at the place of destination.

15.name: Main carriage - fourth carrier
15.desc: The fourth carrier of the ordered transport.

16.name: Main carriage - fifth carrier
16.desc: The fifth carrier of the ordered transport.

17.name: Main carriage - sixth carrier
17.desc: The sixth carrier of the ordered transport.

18.name: Main carriage - seventh carrier
18.desc: The seventh carrier of the ordered transport.

19.name: Main carriage - eighth carrier
19.desc: The eighth carrier of the ordered transport.

20.name: Main-carriage transport
20.desc:
The primary stage in the movement of cargo from the point of origin to
                                    the intended destination.

21.name: Main carriage - first carrier
21.desc:
The first carrier of the ordered transport when more than one carrier
                                    is involved.

22.name: Main carriage - second carrier
22.desc:
The second carrier of the ordered transport when more than one carrier
                                    is involved.

23.name: Main carriage - third carrier
23.desc:
The third carrier of the ordered transport when more than one carrier
                                    is involved.

24.name: Inland waterway transport
24.desc: Transport by which goods are moved via an inland body of water.

25.name: Delivery carrier all transport
25.desc:
Carrier responsible from the point of origin to the final delivery
                                    destination.

26.name: Second pre-carriage transport
26.desc:
Second transport by which the goods are moved prior to their main
                                    carriage transport.

27.name: Pre-acceptance transport
27.desc: The transport by which the goods are moved to the place of acceptance.

28.name: Second on-carriage transport
28.desc:
Second transport by which the goods are moved after the main carriage
                                    transport.

29.name: Main carriage - ninth carrier
29.desc: The ninth carrier of the ordered transport.

30.name: On-carriage transport
30.desc:
Transport by which the goods are moved after the main carriage
                                    transport.

31.name: Main carriage - tenth carrier
31.desc: The tenth carrier of the ordered transport.

32.name: Main carriage - eleventh carrier
32.desc: The eleventh carrier of the ordered transport.

33.name: Main carriage - twelfth carrier
33.desc: The twelfth carrier of the ordered transport.
